Plot: A mysterious woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. Events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.
Title: Under the Skin
Writer: Walter Campbell, Jonathan Glazer, Michel Faber (based on the novel by)
Actors: Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy McWilliams, Lynsey Taylor Mackay, Dougie McConnell
tomatoConsensus: Its message may prove elusive for some, but with absorbing imagery and a mesmerizing performance from Scarlett Johansson, Under the Skin is a haunting viewing experience.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 23 wins & 93 nominations.
